pr_title: SONARJAVA-3223 S5122 should support CorsRegistry from Spring

timeline.bodyText: You can use ExpressionUtils.methodName(mit) for that.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.bodyText: I don't see the interest of such complicated methods to tests this. Keep the test case minimal to what we really tests.  For instance, invocations of allowedMethods, allowCredentials, etc. are not related to the behavior of the rule.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3223 S5122 should support CorsRegistry from Spring
